overview: Everyone's dream is to have the perfect marriage and a person to make love with for the rest of their life. These ladies have found just that, and Lesbian Bridal Stories 2 documents passions after they've tied the knot. Lesbians who've just made a life commitment, are going to show their girlfriends just how much they still love them by using their body, tongue, fingers, and if there's a toy lying around, they'll use that too!
title: Lesbian Bridal Stories 2
